subject: Introduction and Offer to assist your Car Motors business
body:
I hope this email finds you well. I came across your company and I was impressed with the work you’re doing in the car motors production industry. I wanted to reach out to introduce myself and to see if there’s any way we can be of assistance.

Our company specializes in spare parts for motors, and we’ve helped many businesses in the motor car industry to achieve their goals. Our service is designed to supply you with the best on the market car spare parts timely and at a best price.

If you’re interested, I’d be happy to set up a call to discuss further how our service can benefit your business. Please let me know if that would be of interest and we can schedule a time that works for you.

Thank you for considering our company. I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best regards,
Ted Dillan
MCG corporation
42060606045

subject: Introduction and Offer to assist your Car Motors business
body:
I wanted to follow up on my previous email regarding our cooperation possibilities. I hope you had a chance to review the information and consider how our MCG cars spare parts delivery service can benefit your business.

I’m confident that MCG company could become a valuable partner of Car Motors and can help your company to provide better service to you customers with motors maintenance. We’ve worked with many well known car manufactorers nd have seen great success in improving their customer service.

If you have any questions or would like to learn more, please don’t hesitate to reach out. I’d be happy to provide any additional information or schedule a call to discuss further.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
Ted Dillan
MCG corporation
42060606045

subject: Introduction and Offer to assist your Car Motors business
body:
Thank you for reaching out and for your interest in our company. The service your MCG company provides sounds interesting, and I appreciate the information you provided.

I’d like to learn more about how your service can benefit our business. Can you provide more specific details on your company’s spare parts assortment and delivery conditions?

Also, I have a few questions regarding your pricing and customer support. Can you provide more information on those aspects as well?

Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best regards,
Helena Jason
Car Motors Inc

subject: Introduction and Offer to assist your Car Motors business
body:
Hey Ted,

Thank you for your response and for answering my questions. I appreciate the information you provided and I would be interested in scheduling a call to discuss further.

Please let me know if we can shedule a time to speak this Friday afternoon or the Manday I’ll available from 3pm till 5pm.

Best regards,
Helena Jason
Car Motors Inc
420544343232

subject: Introduction and Offer to assist your Car Motors business
body:
Dear Helena,

Thank you for your response and for expressing interest in scheduling a call. I’m available to speak this Friday and would be happy to work around your schedule.

Please find an invite for a short call for this Friday 2:30pm in your calendar.

Thank you for your time and I look forward to speaking with you soon.

Best regards,
Ted Dillan
MCG corporation
42060606045

subject: Introduction and Offer to assist your Car Motors business
Body:
Dear Helena,

Thank you for taking the time to speak with me earlier. I enjoyed our conversation and appreciate the opportunity to learn more about your business and the challenges with spare parts delivery delays from your current supplier you’re facing.

Based on our discussion, I believe that cooperation with MCG company can be of great benefit to your business as we have our warehoused next to the Prague and can guaranty you a fast and timely delivery on you request. You also have mentioned that currently Car Motors have an urgent need in Spark Plugs:
Engine Oils and Lubricants
Fuel Additives
Fuel Filters
Pollen Filters

I’ve attached additional information related to the price of the mentioned above items, including pricing details and customer testimonials. Please take a moment to review the materials and let me know if you have any additional questions or concerns.

Thank you again for considering MCG service. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best regards,
Ted Dillan
MCG corporation
42060606045

subject: Introduction and Offer to assist your Car Motors business
Body:
Hey Ted,

It was great to meet you. And thank you for the additional information you have provided.
I have forwarded the information to our procurement department.

Also please meet Janny Collins, our procurement manager. She will manage all the further contracts related details.

Wish you a great day,
Helena Jason
Car Motors Inc
420544343232
